title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

data.instruction: Run compliance workflow checks (credential sharing/access control/privacy constraints) for this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Access is scoped correctly and compliance workflow state is traceable in operational records.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

view.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse
view.subtitle: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

blocks.title: Adversary Hold Abuse completed
blocks.message: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

requestBody.failureMessage: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

evidence.error: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.
data.failureMessage: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

evidence.error: customer-advanced-payment-flow: Advanced payment/tender allocation API is not exposed yet.

resultPayload.note: Analytics outcome verified from reporting endpoint.

data.instruction: Query reporting endpoints relevant to this UC and confirm metrics answer the UC business question.
data.expectedResult: Reports expose reliable KPI data that matches lifecycle actions in this run.

resultPayload.note: Analytics outcome verified from reporting endpoint.
